name: Fuel Digital Media
overview:
Fuel Digital Media is a boutique media firm that manages high-impact, contextually-relevant advertising campaigns for web publishers whose inventory they sell exclusively and advertisers across North America, while also brokering and managing some of North Americas top-performing English and French email files and newsletter lists.

They tailor a comprehensive menu of custom media, direct marketing, mobile advertising, promotional and sponsorship programs to help clients ranging from major ad agencies to leading marketers maximize brand awareness within their ideal audience segment.

They exclusively represent high-profile French & English Canadian Web/Mobile sites, such as all of the TELUS properties: www.mytelus.com, www.montelus.com, www.myhealthreference.com, www.monreperesante.com, Cinemaclock properties (www.cinemaclock.com, www.cinemaquebec.com, www.cinemamontreal.com), Homeaway properties (Homeaway.com, VRBO.com, www.vacationrentals.com), Remax-Quebec.com, Canadiangolfer.com, and more.

They deliver all IAB formats, including traditional display units, rising stars display ad units, as well as skins, pre rolls, video in banner, 300x600 and custom units.

external_links.title: Fuel Digital Media launches in Montreal
John Sclapari carbure a la pub et ouvre une firme de representation
